com.oryzone.mvdetector.warningAction
Interface IWarningAction

public interface IWarningAction

Interface used to define a warning action. A warning action can be registered to be executed when some movements are detected and the application goes to warning mode. When the warning mode starts the method onWarningStart(com.googlecode.javacv.cpp.opencv_core.IplImage, java.util.Date) is fired, instead, when the warning mode ends, the method onWarningEnd(com.googlecode.javacv.cpp.opencv_core.IplImage[], java.util.Date, java.util.Date) is fired. Each warning action is configurable and can expose its own configuration panel as a Swing JPanel.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Luciano Mammino, Andrea Mangano

Parameters:

Method automatically called when the warning mode ends.

Parameters:
